According to ESRS S1 paragraph 50 (b) and paragraph 52 (a)(b), the undertaking has two options
to report information on employees by contract type: head count or full-time equivalent. (ESRS
S1 paragraph AR 55, tables 3 and 4 contain the templates that undertakings shall use to disclose
